pageTitle: Footasylum Store Gift Card (From £10 to £300) | Black | Footasylum
textBeforeTable: Mens Footwear Please use the tables below to find your size. These are only a guide, and may not be accurate as sizes do vary between brands. For example, G-Star are usually a small fitting and so if you have not tried their clothing before, we recommend you buy a size up from your regular size. Footwear All footwear sizes displayed on our website are UK sizes, however some products may display EU sizes on the box or shoe itself. European scales do not exactly match UK scales and may vary from brand to brand. The Store Gift Card can be redeemed online or in any of our high street stores.To redeem online:Each card has a small foil panel on the reverse which when scratchedoff reveals a pin number which is needed along with the long card number(also on the reverse) to redeem the card online. Please note that gift cardscannot be redeemed on our mobile site or iPhone app Voucher expires after 12 months. Standard UK Delivery: £3.95 Free standard delivery for orders over £50 Next Day UK Delivery: £5.95 European Delivery: 15 EUR Rest of the world delivery: 20 USD More information on delivery.
